Name: wurmunlimited
Overview: This Docker will download and install SteamCMD. It will also install Wurm Unlimited with or without the Server-ModLauncher and run it.

game_id.Name: GAME_ID
game_id.Description:
The GAME_ID that the container download at startup.
(https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Dedicated_Servers_List)

steam-username.Name: Steam-Username
steam-username.Description: Your Steam username goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

validateinstallation.Name: Validate Installation
validateinstallation.Description: Set the Variable to 'true' if you want to validate the installation otherwise leave it blank.

steam-password.Name: Steam-Password
steam-password.Description: Your Steam password goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

enablemodlauncher.Name: Enable Mod Launcher
enablemodlauncher.Description: To enable the Server-ModLauncher set it to 'true' (without quotes) otherwise leave it blank.

maxplayers.Name: Max Players
maxplayers.Description: Define the maximum players on the server

homeserver.Name: Homeserver
homeserver.Description: If set to 'true' (without quotes) Server is a homeserver and belongs to a single kingdom.

homekingdom.Name: HOMEKINGDOM
homekingdom.Description: If you're using the Adventure base, use 1, 2, or 3. || If you're using Creative, use 4. || Kingdom numbers: 0 - No kingdom | 1 - Jen-Kellon | 2 - Mol-Rehan | 3 - Horde of the Summoned | 4 - Freedom

game_mode.Name: GAME_MODE
game_mode.Description: Choose between 'Adventure' and 'Creative' (without quotes) or copy your own map to the root of the serverfolder and define the name of the mapfolder here

loginserver.Name: LOGINSERVER
loginserver.Description: If set to 'false' the server is intended to connect to another server who is the loginserver.

epicsettings.Name: EPICSETTINGS
epicsettings.Description: If set to true the server will follow the rules of the Epic servers in Wurm Online

extrastartupparmeters.Name: Extra Startup Parmeters
extrastartupparmeters.Description: Enter your extra start up commands for the server if needed.

udp2.Name: UDP2
udp2.Description: UDP Queryport (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new UDP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to click an 'Show more settings ...

tcp2.Name: TCP2
tcp2.Description: TCP Gameport (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new TCP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to click an 'Show more settings ...
